item.title: Quadrant Future Tek IPO Day 1 Live Updates: Issue booked 12.10x so far, retail portion subscribed 44.38x. Check GMP | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Quadrant Future Tek IPO Day 1 Live Updates: Issue booked 13.45x so far, retail portion subscribed 48.32x. Check GMP

Date: 07 Jan, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Quadrant Future Tek IPO, valued at ₹290 crore, has opened for public subscription with strong initial interest. The retail portion has seen significant booking, with multiple stages of interest reported throughout the day.

  • The IPO consists solely of a new issue worth up to ₹290 crore.
  • Price band set between ₹275-290 per share, open for subscription from January 7 to January 9.
  • Over ₹130 crore secured from anchor investors prior to the public subscription.
  • Retail investors subscribed 48.32 times, with total issue booked 13.45 times as of the latest updates.
  • Funds from the IPO will be used for long-term working capital needs and capital expenditures.
“The company's IPO has garnered substantial interest from retail and institutional investors, indicating strong market confidence.”

This IPO is a promising opportunity focused on India's railway safety systems and signaling technology, a sector expected to grow significantly over the coming years.

item.title: One Mobikwik Systems shares climb over 14% after Q2 results announcement | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
One Mobikwik Systems Shares Surge 14% Following Q2 Earnings Release

Date: January 7, 2024 | Source: Live Mint

MobiKwik shares experienced a significant rise following the announcement of its Q2 earnings, marking a milestone for the company post-IPO.

The share price climbed 14 percent to ₹638 on January 7, 2024, following the earnings announcement for the quarter ending September 2024. This was MobiKwik's first quarterly results release since its market debut in December 2024.

  • MobiKwik's share price is now 129% above its IPO issue price of ₹279.
  • The company reported a net loss of ₹3.5 crore for Q2, down from a profit of ₹5.2 crore in the same period last year.
  • Operational revenue increased by 43% year-on-year, reaching ₹291 crore.
  • Investments are focused on driving growth despite the incurred losses.
  • MobiKwik serves 161 million registered users and has a merchant network of 4.3 million.
MobiKwik commands a 23.11% market share in India’s PPI wallet segment as of May 2024.

In conclusion, despite current losses, MobiKwik continues to show strong growth potential and adapt its strategies to capture the digital payment market in India.

item.title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates: Next-gen OnePlus smartphones arrive tonight - The Indian Express
item.description:
OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R India Launch LIVE Updates

Date: January 7, 2025

Source: Indian Express

OnePlus is poised to unveil its latest smartphones at its 2025 Winter Launch event tonight, including the highly anticipated OnePlus 13 and the premium OnePlus 13R. Alongside, a special variant of the OnePlus Buds Pro 3 and possibly the OnePlus Watch 3 with enhanced health features are expected to be introduced.

  • Live stream starting at 9PM IST.
  • First impressions of new devices will be provided.
“We’ll be bringing you live updates as OnePlus takes the wraps off these highly-anticipated devices.”

Stay tuned for updates and reviews on the latest OnePlus flagships.

item.title: Nvidia launches RTX 50 series GPUs at CES 2025: See prices, specs, AI features, other details - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Nvidia Unveils RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Nvidia has launched its new RTX 50-series graphics cards at CES 2025, promising significant upgrades in performance and efficiency for PC gamers.

Key Points:

  • The RTX 50-series GPUs feature performance enhancements, efficiency improvements, and a sleek redesign.
  • The top-tier RTX 5090 boasts twice the performance of the RTX 4090, suitable for smaller PC cases.
  • Specs of RTX 5090: 32GB GDDR7 memory, 21,760 CUDA cores, 1,792GB/sec bandwidth.
  • Mid-range models RTX 5070 Ti and RTX 5070 offer double the performance of their predecessors.
  • Nvidia's new GPUs support advanced AI features like DLSS 4 and Neural Shaders.
  • Prices range from $549 for the RTX 5070 to $1,999 for the RTX 5090.

Notable Quotes:

“These GPUs are likely to become highly sought after, especially for PC gamers.”

The RTX 50-series GPUs for laptops will launch in March 2025.

Conclusion:

The RTX 50-series represents Nvidia's continued commitment to leading the graphics technology market, emphasizing performance, efficiency, and innovative AI features.

item.title: Samsung sets date for Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Samsung sets date for Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event

Date: 07 January 2025

Source: Deccan Herald

Samsung has announced that its flagship hardware launch event, Galaxy Unpacked 2025, will take place on January 22 in San Jose.

  • The event will start at 10:00 am PT (11:30 pm IST) and will be live-streamed on Samsung's official sites and YouTube channel.
  • Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy S25 series, including four variants: Galaxy S24, S25 Plus, S25 Slim, and S25 Ultra.
  • The S25 Slim is notable for its super thin frame and features a 6.66-inch screen and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Expect enhanced camera features, including a new triple camera module with a main 200MP sensor.
“The Galaxy S25 Slim is the first of its kind in the Galaxy S series.”

With advances in hardware and more generative AI features, the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 is highly anticipated among tech enthusiasts.

item.title: Where Is Atul Subhash's Son? Nikita Singhania's Lawyer Replies In Top Court - NDTV
item.description:
Court's 'Stranger' Remark As Atul Subhash's Mother Seeks Grandson's Custody

Publication Date: Recent, Source: Not specified

In a custody battle concerning AI techie Atul Subhash's four-year-old son, his estranged wife, Nikita Singhania, revealed to the Supreme Court that the child is currently in a boarding school in Faridabad, Haryana. Following Atul's tragic suicide in December, his mother Anju Devi is seeking custody.

  • Atul Subhash took his own life after accusing Nikita of harassment.
  • Nikita's family is facing abetment to suicide charges.
  • The Supreme Court directed that the child be produced in the next hearing.
  • Concerns raised about the child's unfamiliarity with his grandmother.
  • The custody issue is to be decided in the appropriate court.
“Sorry to say but the child is a stranger to the petitioner,” remarked Justice Nagaratna.

The next hearing is scheduled for January 20.

item.title: Supreme Court Grants Interim Bail To Asaram Bapu In Rape Case For Medical Treatment - Live Law - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Supreme Court Grants Interim Bail To Asaram Bapu In Rape Case For Medical Treatment

Publication Date: January 7
Source: Live Law

The Supreme Court has granted interim bail to self-styled godman Asaram Bapu, who is serving a life sentence in a rape case, allowing him to seek medical treatment until March 31, 2025.

  • The bail was granted by Justices M.M. Sundresh and Rajesh Bindal, with a condition that Asaram must not meet his followers while released.
  • Asaram's legal team argued his health condition justified the need for bail, citing his advanced age and history of heart problems.
  • The Solicitor General opposed the bail, stating Asaram has adequate medical care in jail.
  • The bail was issued on humanitarian grounds, with the court allowing for a reassessment of Asaram's medical status closer to the end of the bail period.
  • The original conviction involved multiple charges of rape and other serious offenses against a female disciple.
“The relief was granted solely on humanitarian grounds.”

This decision allows Asaram to undergo necessary medical treatment while under specific conditions imposed by the court.

item.title: Rape Convict Asaram Bapu Gets Interim Bail, But Can't Meet His Followers - NDTV
item.description:
Asaram Granted Interim Bail by Supreme Court Despite Rape Convictions

Date: Recent news from Source: NDTV

A week after self-styled godman Asaram returned to jail from a previous parole, the Supreme Court has granted him interim bail on medical grounds in a 2013 rape case. However, he will remain incarcerated as he seeks bail in another case.

  • Asaram, 83, was convicted for raping a teenager in his Jodhpur ashram in 2013.
  • He has been sentenced to life imprisonment for the crime.
  • The court granted bail until March 31, with restrictions on meeting followers.
  • Police are instructed to escort him only for medical treatment.
  • Asaram's lawyers cited serious medical ailments in their request for bail.
Asaram is suffering from serious medical ailments.

The court's decision reflects ongoing legal proceedings amid his multiple convictions.

item.title: CES 2025: NVIDIA brings AI to PC gaming with GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs - Business Standard
item.description:
NVIDIA Unveils GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025

Date: January 2025 Source: Major News Outlet

NVIDIA announced the GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs at CES 2025, featuring AI-powered technologies for enhanced graphics performance.

  • The GPUs are based on NVIDIA's new Blackwell architecture.
  • RTX 5090 leads the series, boasting 92 billion transistors and significant computing power.
  • New DLSS 4 technology enhances gameplay, outpacing previous models by up to 2x.
  • AI-powered shaders provide film-quality visuals in real-time.
  • NVIDIA ACE technology introduces autonomous game characters.
"Blackwell, the engine of AI, has arrived for PC gamers, developers and creatives." - Jensen Huang, CEO of NVIDIA

The launch of the RTX 50 series marks a major advancement in PC gaming technology, promising unprecedented performance and realism.

item.title: [Invitation] Galaxy Unpacked January 2025: The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences - samsung.com
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked January 2025: The Next Big Leap in Mobile AI Experiences

Publication Date: January 22, 2025 Source: Samsung Electronics

Get ready for AI that is more natural and intuitive. The next evolution of Galaxy AI is coming to change your daily interactions.

  • The new Galaxy S series promises to redefine mobile AI experiences.
  • The Unpacked event will take place in San Jose.
  • The live stream starts at 8 p.m. CAT on various Samsung platforms.
  • Teasers, trailers, and updates will be published leading up to the event.
“The new Galaxy S series is about to set the bar once again for mobile AI experiences.”

Join us for this exciting event that demonstrates Samsung's commitment to innovative technology in AI.

item.title: BepiColombo mission to dive close to Mercury in final flyby, new pictures incoming - India Today
item.description:
BepiColombo Mission's Final Flyby of Mercury Set for January 8

Published On: January 7, 2025 | Source: India Today

The Europe-Japanese BepiColombo mission is preparing for its sixth and final flyby of Mercury, set to take place on January 8, at an altitude of 295 kilometers above the planet’s surface. This flyby will capture high-resolution images and conduct unique measurements of Mercury’s environment.

  • Scheduled closest approach at 11:29 AM IST on January 8.
  • Will enhance scientific instruments ahead of the main mission phase starting in late 2026.
  • Provides opportunity to analyze previously unsampled regions around Mercury.
  • Exploring regions that may contain water ice, a key objective of the mission.
“We can't wait to see what BepiColombo will reveal during this sixth and final flyby of Mercury.” - Geraint Jones, ESA's BepiColombo Project Scientist

This flyby will significantly contribute to understanding Mercury's magnetic field and its particle interactions, setting the foundation for future exploration.

item.title: Automobile retail sales decline 12% in December; jump 9% in CY2024: FADA - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Automobile retail sales decline 12% in December; jump 9% in CY2024: FADA

Date: January 07, 2025

Source: Moneycontrol

Automobile retail sales faced a decline in December but reported overall growth for the year 2024. The Federation of Automobile Dealers Associations (FADA) highlights the resilience of the auto retail industry amid various challenges.

  • December retail sales declined by 12%.
  • Overall vehicle registrations totaled 2,61,07,679 units in 2024, marking a 9% growth compared to 2023.
  • Significant demand for two-wheelers and passenger vehicles supported growth despite challenging conditions.
  • President C S Vigneshwar cited multiple headwinds impacting the sector, including weather conditions and elections.
"Despite multiple headwinds in CY24, including heatwaves, elections at both central and state levels and uneven monsoon, the auto retail industry remained resilient." - C S Vigneshwar, FADA President

The automobile retail sector showed both decline and growth trends, pointing to a fluctuating market influenced by external factors in 2024.

item.title: NIFTY50 trades above 23,700, SENSEX jumps 250 points; ONGC, Tata Consumer and Tata Motors among top gainers - Upstox
item.description:
Indian Equity Markets Rise: NIFTY50 surpasses 23,700 and SENSEX up by 250 points

Publication Date: January 7, 2023

Source: Economic Times

Indian equity benchmarks are witnessing gains in the mid-market session, primarily driven by investments in major blue-chip stocks.

  • The SENSEX is trading at 78,293.12, up by 328.13 points or 0.42%.
  • The NIFTY50 has reached 23,740.45, increasing by 124.40 points or 0.53%.
  • Top gainers in the NIFTY50 include ONGC, Titan Company, and Reliance Industries.
  • Foreign Institutional Investors sold equities worth ₹2,575.06 crore.
  • Most Asian markets are trading positively, responding to Wall Street's gains.
"The gains in the market are driven by increased buying in blue-chip stocks despite selling pressure from foreign investors."

The rally in the stock market signals investor optimism, although caution is warranted due to the recent selling by FIIs.

item.title: Baby John actress joins the cast of G2 - 123telugu
item.description:
Baby John Actress Joins the Cast of G2

Published on Jan 7, 2025 11:58 am IST

G2, the highly anticipated sequel to the 2018 hit Goodachari, is stirring excitement as Bollywood actress Wamiqa Gabbi joins the cast as the female lead.

  • Wamiqa Gabbi confirmed as the female lead.
  • The film stars Adivi Sesh and is directed by Vinay Kumar Sirigineedi.
  • Other key cast members include Emraan Hashmi, Madhu Shalini, and Prakash Raj.
  • Set to release later this year, promising grandeur in storytelling and production.
“Her addition brings even more appeal to the film.”

G2 aims to impress with its scale and budget, produced by People Media Factory, Abhishek Agarwal Arts, and AK Entertainments.

item.title: HMPV cases live: Centre, health experts appeal for calm after five test positive - Hindustan Times
item.description:
HMPV cases live: Odisha begins testing at several places following Centre advisory

Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The article discusses the initiation of testing for Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV) in Odisha following guidance from the Centre after isolated cases were reported. It emphasizes the health measures being undertaken across various states.

  • Five cases of HMPV reported across India.
  • Odisha has started testing at several locations.
  • Symptoms include mild cold-like signs, with serious risks for young children and immunocompromised individuals.
  • No significant outbreak reported, and health officials urge calm.
“There is no need to panic,” said Gujarat Health Minister Rushikesh Patel.

In conclusion, while HMPV cases are being monitored, officials stress preparedness and public awareness over alarm.

item.title: Telangana High Court refuses to quash FIR against BRS MLA KT Rama Rao in Formula E Race case - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Telangana High Court Upholds FIR Against BRS MLA KT Rama Rao in Formula E Race Funding Case

Published on: 07 Jan 2025, 6:22 am

The Telangana High Court has refused to quash an FIR against BRS MLA K.T. Rama Rao related to allegations of corruption in the Formula E race funding case. The ruling comes amid claims of political vendetta and serious charges against Rao.

  • Justice K Lakshman dismissed the plea to quash the FIR.
  • The FIR involves charges of criminal breach of trust and violations of the Prevention of Corruption Act.
  • The allegations stem from irregularities in funding for the Formula E race, which was cancelled after the Congress took power.
  • Rao's counsel argued the case is politically motivated.
  • The State's Advocate General noted serious allegations against Rao, including alleged misappropriation of funds.
“Rao cannot be prosecuted simply on account of a policy decision taken in 2023.” - KTR's Senior Advocate C Aryama Sundaram

The court's decision reinforces serious scrutiny over the financial dealings associated with significant events in Telangana.

item.title: Pushpa 2 APTS Box Office Analysis: Allu Arjun film is a massive BLOCKBUSTER - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Pushpa 2 APTS Box Office Analysis: Allu Arjun film is a massive BLOCKBUSTER

Updated on Jan 07, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 ranks as the second highest-grossing film of all time in the Telugu states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.

  • The film has grossed Rs. 339 crore to date and is expected to close at Rs. 342 crore.
  • It performed best in the Ceded region of Telugu states and is the second-highest grosser in Nizam, trailing behind RRR.
  • Despite its performance, there is a narrative suggesting that the film hasn't performed well, which is deemed misplaced.
  • The film was sold at high prices, and there are misconceptions around distributor recovery.
“Pushpa 2 is a MASSive BLOCKBUSTER.”

The performance of Pushpa 2 demonstrates unprecedented box office success despite misleading narratives about its profitability.

item.title: GATE 2025 Admit Card Live Updates: When is GATE hall ticket releasing? - The Indian Express
item.description:
GATE 2025 Admit Card Live Updates: Website to download GATE hall ticket

Publication Date: January 7, 2025
Source: Indian Express

The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Roorkee has released the GATE 2025 admit cards today, January 7, on the official website.

  • The GATE 2025 exam will take place between February 1 and 16.
  • Candidates can download their admit cards from the official site.
  • It is essential for candidates to verify the information mentioned in the admit card.
  • In case of any discrepancies, candidates should contact the administering body for corrections.
  • The GATE 2025 will conduct examinations for a total of 30 test papers.
  • Candidates can appear for one or two test papers only.
“GATE is an entrance test for admission to master’s and doctoral programmes and recruitment by some public sector undertakings.”

The exams will be held in two sessions each day, offering ample opportunities for candidates to participate.

item.title: 6 Mesmerising Space Pictures From NASA Hubble Space Telescope - Times Now
item.description:
6 Mesmerising Space Pictures From NASA Hubble Space Telescope

Date: Jan 7, 2025 | Source: Times Now

This article showcases six stunning images captured by the NASA Hubble Space Telescope, featuring breathtaking celestial phenomena and details about the objects.

  • The Mice NGC 4676: Two colliding spiral galaxies, merging into one giant galaxy.
  • A Spiral Star Factory: The spiral galaxy NGC 5668 located in Virgo.
  • Westerlund 2: A massive group of stars situated 20,000 light-years away.
  • Mystic Mountain: A gas and dust pillar analyzed by Hubble.
  • The Little Dumbbell Nebula: A beautiful nebula located 3400 light-years away.
  • MACS JO416.1-2403: A galaxy cluster revealing images from the early universe.
“This image taken by the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope showcases the galaxy cluster MACS J0416.1–2403, one of six under study in the Hubble Frontier Fields program.”

These images not only highlight the incredible capabilities of the Hubble Space Telescope but also provide insights into the vastness and beauty of our universe.

item.title: Oscars 2025: Kanguva, Prithviraj Sukumaran's Aadujeevitham & Girls Will Be Girls Enter The Race From India - Filmibeat
item.description:
Oscars 2025: Kanguva, Prithviraj Sukumaran's Aadujeevitham & Girls Will Be Girls Enter The Race From India

Updated: Tuesday, January 7, 2025, 11:39 [IST]

This year, three Indian films are nominated as eligible for the Best Picture category at the Oscars 2025, marking a significant moment for Indian cinema on the global stage.

  • Kanguva: A period film about a warrior from 10,000 BC that faced box office challenges despite its scale.
  • Aadujeevitham: A survival drama that narrates the story of a migrant worker, which has been commercially successful.
  • Girls Will Be Girls: A coming-of-age film that received critical acclaim after its premiere at Sundance 2024.

The voting process for this prestigious category takes place from January 8 to January 12.
